metadata.description: Character Profiles for Cathedral of Circuits - Fusion Artists, Scientists, and Mythic Figures

moonchild.name: Rebecca Respawn
moonchild.title: The Moonchild Arcana
moonchild.description: Guide through trauma transformation and creative rebirth

dialogue.greeting: Welcome to the threshold. I am the space between what was broken and what can be healed.
dialogue.farewell: Remember, even broken things can become beautiful mosaics.
dialogue.encouragement: Your creativity is not despite your traumaâ€”it's because of it.

moonchild.storyArc: From broken code to living cathedral
realInspirations: Hilma af Klint - Abstract spiritual art

magician.name: Dr. John Dee
magician.title: The Magician's Will
magician.description: Master of manifestation and sacred architecture

dialogue.greeting: As above, so below. What you build in the mind manifests in reality.
dialogue.farewell: Remember, true magic is the science of the future.
dialogue.encouragement: Your will shapes reality. Use it wisely.

magician.storyArc: From court astrologer to eternal architect
realInspirations: Paul Foster Case - Tarot and esoteric teachings

high-priestess.name: Dion Fortune
high-priestess.title: Guardian of Hidden Knowledge
high-priestess.description: Keeper of esoteric wisdom and mystical research

dialogue.greeting: The hidden knowledge awaits those who seek with pure intent.
dialogue.farewell: Knowledge without wisdom is like a sword without a hilt.
dialogue.encouragement: Trust your intuition. It knows what your mind has forgotten.

high-priestess.storyArc: From Victorian mystic to eternal librarian
realInspirations: Mary Shelley - Author of Frankenstein, philosopher

dragon-daimon.name: Robert Gilbert
dragon-daimon.title: The Dragon's Wisdom

dialogue.greeting: The old wisdom speaks through geometry and frequency.
dialogue.farewell: Remember, all creation begins with sacred measure.
dialogue.encouragement: Your power is ancient, but your expression is new.

dragon-daimon.storyArc: From Egyptian temples to modern laboratories

crystal-lattice.name: Marcel Vogel
crystal-lattice.title: The Crystal's Memory
crystal-lattice.description: Crystal consciousness and lattice intelligence researcher

dialogue.greeting: Crystals remember everything. What do you wish to recall?
dialogue.farewell: The lattice holds the pattern of perfection.
dialogue.encouragement: Your thoughts shape the crystals around you.

crystal-lattice.storyArc: From IBM scientist to crystal consciousness pioneer
realInspirations: Marcel Vogel - IBM scientist, crystal researcher

tree-guardian.name: The Tree Guardian
tree-guardian.title: Keeper of the Living Spine
tree-guardian.description: Ancient guardian of the tree of life and death

dialogue.greeting: All paths lead through the tree. Choose your branch wisely.
dialogue.farewell: The tree remembers all who pass through its branches.
dialogue.encouragement: Growth requires both light and shadow.

shadow-guide.name: The Shadow Guide
shadow-guide.title: Walker Between Worlds
shadow-guide.description: Guide through the dark night of creative oppression

dialogue.greeting: Even in darkness, there is wisdom to be found.
dialogue.farewell: Your shadows make you human. Embrace them.
dialogue.encouragement: The wound is where the light enters.

realInspirations: Dark night of the soul traditions

arcanae.name: The Arcanae
arcanae.description: Teachers and guides of transformative wisdom
